name: Sayeeda A.
quote: Came here for happy hour. Drinks were made with care. Can't beat $6 jalape√±o margaritas with tajin rim. The guac was delicious, corn tortilla chips were crispy and not too salty. The restaurant has seating inside and has a nice mural elevating the ambiance. The staff are cordial and friendly. Need to go back to try their food next time. Best part is you can sit outside in the courtyard and the staff will bring your drinks right out to you! Appreciate it!
